entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
